actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service, S. Rept. 93-701.
Cloture motion filed in Senate (Second motion).
Cloture motion passed Senate, roll call #54 (67-31).
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #57 (71-26).

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolves, that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay for the offices referred to insection 225(f)(A) of the Federal Salary Act of 1967 (relating to Members of Congress), transmitted to the Congress on February 4, 1974.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Declares that the Senate disapproves all the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay of Government employees as transmitted to the Congress in the budget for the fiscal year 1975 pursuant to the Federal Salary Act.

titles.title: Resolves, that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay for the offices referred to insection 225(f)(A) of the Federal Salary Act of 1967 (relating to Members of Congress), transmitted to the Congress on February 4, 1974.
